data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jäger, Peter (2013): Ctenus monaghani spec. nov., a nocturnal hunter from the forest floor in Laos (Araneae: Ctenidae). Zootaxa 3670 (1): 91-93, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3670.1.9
